about_the_game:
The Sci-Fi Portals Mini Kit is a fantastic introduction to Sci-Fi to your games, packed with portals, gateways and supporting machinery - a perfect way to indulge in a little cross-genre visuals. Could the towering machine glimpsed from the castle roof be a relic of a distant past-age of technology, or visitors from another world - the possibilities are endless!

Containing 25+ new assets that may be used countless ways, it's a perfect way to introduce a touch of science-fiction to your games.
This pack includes...
Varieties of Portals and Gateways
Generic Technology Items, such as Storage Tanks, Boxes and Towers

Adapted for use by the artist "Kasseyus" and optimised exclusively for the GameGuru MAX engine, Explore like never before, with this great range of Low Poly assets!
